    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean loadStream​(int soundName, javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream audioInputStream)
      Loading an audio stream from a file Giving the audio stream a specified name Formatting and initializing the audio data info Putting the audio stream into the hashmap Returning true if the audio stream loaded successfully else returning false
      void play​(int soundName, boolean loop)
      Plays a sound that has already been loaded by one of the sound loading methods The sound can be played once or looped forever If the specified sound name does not exist, this method does nothing
      void playSongs​(java.util.List<javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream> streams)
      Plays songs in the list of AudioInputStreams objects
      void resume()
      Resume the current song Method to play song at a certain time interval
      void resume​(int soundName)
      Resume the current song based on the sound name in thread
      void shutdown()
      Stops all playing sounds and closes all lines and audio input streams Any previously loaded sounds will have to be re-loaded to be played again
      void stop()
      Stop the current song Method to stop song at a certain time interval
      void stop​(int soundName)
      Stops playing the current song based on the sound name in thread

    • Method Detail

      • loadStream

        public boolean loadStream​(int soundName,
                          javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream audioInputStream)
        Loading an audio stream from a file Giving the audio stream a specified name Formatting and initializing the audio data info Putting the audio stream into the hashmap Returning true if the audio stream loaded successfully else returning false
        Parameters:
        soundName - - {String} the name to give this audio stream
        audioInputStream - - {AudioInputStream} the name of the file to load the audio stream from
        Returns:
        retVal

      • playSongs

        public void playSongs​(java.util.List<javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream> streams)
        Plays songs in the list of AudioInputStreams objects
        Parameters:
        streams - - {List} the list of AudioInputStreams to be played

      • play

        public void play​(int soundName,
                 boolean loop)
        Plays a sound that has already been loaded by one of the sound loading methods The sound can be played once or looped forever If the specified sound name does not exist, this method does nothing
        Parameters:
        soundName - - {String} the name of the sound to play
        loop - - {boolean} determinant if the sound should loop forever or play once

      • resume

        public void resume()
        Resume the current song Method to play song at a certain time interval

      • resume

        public void resume​(int soundName)
        Resume the current song based on the sound name in thread
        Parameters:
        soundName - - {int} the name of the sound to resume

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop the current song Method to stop song at a certain time interval

      • stop

        public void stop​(int soundName)
        Stops playing the current song based on the sound name in thread
        Parameters:
        soundName - - {String} the name of the sound to stop

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Stops all playing sounds and closes all lines and audio input streams Any previously loaded sounds will have to be re-loaded to be played again
